123484.「本当に <%sL_ITEM>を\n いただいてしまって よろしいのですか！？\:
Are you sure you don't want to give me
<%sL_ITEM>?<yesno><break>

123751.「あの……。ぬいぐるみを\n ひとつも 持っておられないようです。: Uh... You don't have any stuffed animals...

123813.「あら……。でも <pc>さんは\n 持ち物が いっぱいのようですね。\n<br:
Oh... But...<pc> You seem to have a lot of stuff. I'm sorry,
but would you mind coming back later to make
room in the toolbox?

Oh, my...! Are you sure you want to accept such a wonderful thing? It's a stuffed animal of the Ogre race! This is a boy... Even as a
stuffed animal, you can see how strong their bodies are. The horn on his head is also very familiar to me!

125187.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:

careful...

134390.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ……。:

134391.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「あっ これ:

134393.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ かわ:

animal...

205685.「これは……ちょっと 斜に構えた印象の\n ウェディ男性の ぬいぐるみですね。\:
This is a... It's a stuffed animal of a Wedi man who looks a little uptight... I can't help but smile when I look at it... Also,
this faded look has a nice calm atmosphere... It makes me feel a little sentimental...

205686.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is a... It's a stuffed human woman with a mysterious atmosphere... But she's so cute... If there's a model for this, she must
be a cute person too...

205687.「……………………。\n<br>\n「……あっ！ すみません。\n 感動のあまり:
... ... Oh! Sumi... I'm so moved I'm speechless... What a humorous and adorable stuffed animal! Thank you for this wonderful
gift...

205688.「これは……かわいらしくも\n どことなく 恐ろしげな雰囲気を ただよわせた\n:
This is... It's a stuffed animal with a cute but vaguely scary vibe... I felt like I was being watched, and it made me feel
unsettled... ... But that's the unique flavor...

205689.「これは……子ブタちゃんを模した\n ぬいぐるみでしょうか？\n<br>\n「…:
Is this... Is this a stuffed animal that looks like a little piggy? ... Is it a terrifying demon that can cast death spells?
The Way of the Stuffed Toy is a very difficult thing to understand...

257317.「これは……見たこともない\n 奇妙な生き物の ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br>\:
It's a... It's a stuffed animal, the strangest creature I've ever seen. ... Is it a demon called Belial? Judging by its
appearance, it's probably just a goofy little demon...

261148.「これは……とっても オシャレで\n かわいらしい女の子の ぬいぐるみですね。\:
This is... A very stylish and cute stuffed girl... Oh... She's the daughter of a great nobleman of the demon world? Now that you
mention it, she does have a devilish charm to her.

261149.「これは……とっても オシャレで\n かわいらしい女の子の ぬいぐるみですね。\:
This is... A very stylish and cute stuffed girl... Oh... She's the daughter of a great nobleman of the demon world? Now that you
mention it, it certainly has a devilish charm to it. The calm color of the plushie looks like antique art, and it even gives off a
sense of luxury, perhaps because the model is a young lady?

265276.「これは……清楚で おしとやかな雰囲気の\n 女性の ぬいぐるみですね。\n<b:
This is a... It's a stuffed animal of a woman with an innocent and gentle air. What? What? The person who modeled it is very gentle? I
don't know. People aren't always what they seem...

271992.「これは……ただならぬ 大物の雰囲気を\n ただよわせる ぬいぐるみですね。\n:
This is... A stuffed animal with the air of a big shot... ... Oh no! He's a demon king who rules the western part of the demon world...
Even as a stuffed animal, this thing exudes such dignity... That's right...

276127.「これは……かわいいけれど\n どことなく 危険な雰囲気を\n ただよわせる ぬ:
This is... It's cute, but there's something dangerous about it... If it weren't for this skull... Why did they have to make this one
so realistic?

282856.「これは……ツノの形こそ 気になりますが\n やさしげで 高貴な雰囲気を感じます:
It's... I'm not sure about the shape of the horn, but it's gentle and noble... That's it! Isn't that a stuffed prince? ..... He's a
demon king who rules the eastern part of the demon world. I don't know... I'm not sure.
